data.message: How We Can Increase Pages Reach and Also how can i verify my Facebook Account ???

replies.message: Hi Ahmad. Facebook automatically verifies certain accounts to help people find authentic profiles and Pages. We're not currently able to accept requests for verified profiles or Pages from the public. If you see a fake account that's impersonating you, your business or your brand, please report it: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/167722253287296. -Chantal

I have my verified page Wih Mine name but i want to verify my Account Too , but i didn't understand how can i contact to facebook or how can i provide my identity .Kindly gave me some needful information and do us a little favour
